verses.verse: A Song<WH7892> of degrees<WH4609> of David.<WH1732> I was glad<WH8055> when they said<WH559> unto me, Let us go<WH1980> into the house<WH1004> of the LORD.<WH3068>
Our feet<WH7272> shall<WH1961> stand<WH5975> within thy gates,<WH8179> O Jerusalem.<WH3389>
Jerusalem <WH3389> is built<WH1129> as a city<WH5892> that is compact<WH7945> <WH2266> together: <WH3162>

Whither <WH7945> <WH8033> the tribes<WH7626> go up,<WH5927> the tribes<WH7626> of the LORD,<WH3050> unto the testimony<WH5715> of Israel,<WH3478> to give thanks<WH3034> unto the name<WH8034> of the LORD.<WH3068>
For <WH3588> there<WH8033> are set<WH3427> thrones<WH3678> of judgment,<WH4941> the thrones<WH3678> of the house<WH1004> of David.<WH1732>
Pray <WH7592> for the peace<WH7965> of Jerusalem:<WH3389> they shall prosper<WH7951> that love<WH157> thee.
Peace <WH7965> be<WH1961> within thy walls,<WH2426> and prosperity<WH7962> within thy palaces.<WH759>
For <WH4616> my brethren<WH251> and companions'<WH7453> sakes, I will now<WH4994> say,<WH1696> Peace<WH7965> be within thee.
Because of<WH4616> the house<WH1004> of the LORD<WH3068> our God<WH430> I will seek<WH1245> thy good.<WH2896>
